player_information.key_achievements: Career highs in 2023 with 96 receptions for 1,364 yards and 8 touchdowns, four seasons with 1,000+ receiving yards, selected to PFWA All-Rookie Team in 2018, has missed only two games in his seven-year career
player_information.performance_goals: Re-establishing himself as the clear WR1 in Ben Johnson's new offense and achieving career-high numbers with improved quarterback play from Caleb Williams

team_information.team_strategy: Building around rookie quarterback Caleb Williams with a strong offensive receiving corps including Moore and Rome Odunze under new offensive coordinator Ben Johnson
team_information.team_success: Currently rebuilding with focus on developing young talent and establishing offensive identity
team_information.salary_cap_space: Significant investment in receiving talent with Moore's extension

contract_financial_details.performance_metrics: receptions, receiving yards, touchdowns, targets, yards after catch, and offensive production metrics

coaching_management.coaching_experience: New head coach Ben Johnson with offensive coordinator experience from Detroit Lions

ownership_information.championship_success: Historic franchise with multiple championships but recent focus on rebuilding
